title: Çift Kişilik Oda
overview: Having lost her parents at a young age, Nilüfer's dream is to work at the Lutesya Hotel, which her parents built. Kaan, one of the heirs of the hotel, returns to the hotel, which has been ruled by his step-sister Sevil for years, to take revenge. Nothing will ever be the same for Nilüfer and Kaan, whose paths cross here.
